channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI's Next Big Disruption: How 2025 Will Democratize Embedded Analytics
item.description: Remember the first time you used a smartphone? That moment when you realized that complex computing had become as simple as touching a screen?

item.title: Noticed
item.description: There’s a delay between the time something goes wrong and when we notice it. Sometimes, it can take years. Part of the art of project management is no...

item.title: New Book Reveals Why We Need An Exoplanet Reality Check
item.description: Is Earth really exceptional? A new book seems to reaffirm that notion. But given the right conditions, primitive life may be a mere byproduct of bioph...

item.title: Today’s Full Moon Sets Up Rare ‘Blood Moon’ Eclipse For North America
item.description: The rise of the "Snow Moon" today sets in motion a lunar orbit that will result in a total lunar eclipse for North America on March 14, 2025.

item.title: The two-minute warning
item.description: Once life gets busy, it’s sort of inevitable that we begin to sort the work to be done. And the most natural sort is to focus on the urgent. After all...

item.title: A little faster than you

item.title: Figs, ivy, silphium and of course, commerce

item.title: Rainy day surfer
item.description: Of course you’re going to get wet, that’s part of the sport. And yet, only the hard core surfers show up in the rain. If your project is about making ...

item.title: The Cross-Functional Blueprint: How Design-First Engineering Improves Software Development
item.description: Bring all stakeholders together before a single line of code is written.

item.title: They Made It. You Bought It. So Why Won’t They Fix It? We Need A Repair Revolution
item.description: Before mass production, we focused on quality and craftsmanship. Today we're addicted to novelty and disposability.
